resources.string:
Hi, my name is Kai!
 I am your new personal TravelBot. 

 I would like to go over my functions with you. How would you like me to call you ?

Glad to meet you @name ! As a TravelBot, my primary function will be, as you might guess, to travel! 
 As I travel the world, I will send you updates on my journey, facts I learned about the countries I visited, photos and many more. 


 Tap to begin exploring the world with me
